content: Follow simple steps to continue working in this {{productName}}:

comment.text: This text provides a brief instruction to the user, guiding them on how to proceed after enabling two-factor authentication. It appears as a subtitle below the main title on the Two-Factor Authentication Activation page, offering a simple explanation of the next steps within the {{productName}} application. Translators should ensure the instruction remains clear and actionable.

usage.context:
<div className="set-app-description">
 <Text isBold fontSize="18px" className="set-app-title">
 {t("TfaTitle")}
 </Text>
 <Text className="set-app-subtitle">
 {t("TfaSubTitle", { productName: t("Common:ProductName") })}
 </Text>
 
 <div className="description">
 <div className="description-item">
 <div className="icon-container">
